## HideOnValueChanges type

Represents a map of controls with callbacks that are called on form value changes. Return true on callback to hide control.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type HideOnValueChanges<TForm> = {
    [P in keyof NotNull<TForm>]: (val: TForm) => boolean;
};
```
